item.description: Boston Millionaires and Friends will be attending the Benefit to help raise funds for a trip to Memphis Tnn. for Satch Ramano and Cindy Daley. They were the winners of the Boston Blues Society's Challange and will hold an all day benift to raise funds for their trip to Memphis to compete in the IBC International Blues Challange in Feb. 2011. This will be a great day for the Blues, Johnny Bluehorn, Erin Harpe, Graccie Currin, Throw Down, Drivin Blind, Chris Fritz, Gypsy Thievs, Lickity Splits and the Regal Queen Herself Miss Shirley Lewis with her great Soul Music. The cost for this show is a $10 donation. Do not miss this show it will be a great time and a good cause. We wish Satch and Cindy good luck in the big contest down in Memphis Town.
item.name: Boston Millionaires meet up at the Next Page Cafe "Blues Celebration"
